question: India’s first Dragonfly fossil was found in which state recently?
explanation:
A group of researchers of West Bengal have discovered India’s first dragonfly fossil at Latehar district of Jharkhand.
The researchers have stated that the fossil would be at least 2.5 million years old. The dragonfly is about 3cm long and has a wingspan of about 2.5cm. The fossil dates back to Permian era (300 million years ago).
